About

Hi, I'm Jacob Cafiero, a full-stack web developer.

In a growing, vast sea of technology, I know I could never know everything, or fully master anything, but this is exactly why I am a Web Developer. Every time I begin a new project, I am excited by the challenge it poses. This is because I know it will offer opportunities to problem solve and inspiration to create innovative designs.

Design

I create design that values both practicality and creativity.

  • Design Tools:
  • Adobe Illustrator
  • Adobe Photoshop
  • Figma
  • Blender

Front-end

I develop front-end clients with a focus on speed and perfomance.

  • Technologies:
  • HTML
  • CSS
  • Javascript
  • React

Back-end

I work back-end data into projects using a variety of client-server structures.

  • Technologies:
  • Node.js
  • PHP
  • PostgreSQL
  • Firebase
